require 'aws-sdk-sns' # v2: require 'aws-sdk'
def topic_created?(sns_client, topic_name)
sns_client.create_topic(name: topic_name) rescue StandardError => e puts "Error while creating the topic named '#{topic_name}': #{e.message}" end
# Full example call: def run_me topic_name = 'TOPIC_NAME' region = 'REGION'
sns_client = Aws::SNS::Client.new(region: region)
puts "Creating the topic '#{topic_name}'..."
if topic_created?(sns_client, topic_name) puts 'The topic was created.' else puts 'The topic was not created. Stopping program.' exit 1 end end
